rows.label: tev025311_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ah, yes. Commander Vandham has briefed us
on them. A terrifying phenomenon, truly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025311_MSG0040
rows.name:
And yet, Mission Control is full of requests,
same as always...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025311_MSG0050
rows.name:
A crisis is a crisis, but I hope you'll keep
lending us your support all through it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025311_MSG0060
rows.name:
With everyone working together,
I'm sure we can overcome any hardship!
There's not a doubt in my mind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025311_MSG0090
rows.name:
With the news of the hero's return,
all of BLADE is boiling with excitement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025311_MSG0100
rows.name:
I've heard people have been roaming the streets
of NLA, looking for Al so they could ask him to
join their division...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025311_MSG0110
rows.name:
Without much success, as I hear it.
...Could it be that he's not a people person?[ST:wait ]
